Package solidbase.core

Class Summary
Assert Assert methods.
AssertCommandExecuter This plugin asserts that a given query statement returns results.
Command Represents a command in the patchfile.
CommandListener A CommandListener listens to commands in the patch file as they are being executed.
Database Manages connections to the database.
DBVersion This class represents the version information in the database.
ImportCSVListener This plugin executes IMPORT CSV statements.
OracleDBMSOutputPoller The purpose of this plugin was to capture dbms output and present it to the user while the patch was running.
OracleDBMSOutputPoller.Poller  
Patch Represents a single patch in the patch file.
Patcher  
PatchFile This class manages the patch file contents and the paths between versions.
ProgressListener  
RandomAccessLineReader A line reader that automatically detects character encoding through the BOM and is able to reposition itself on a line.
Util  
 

Enum Summary
Patch.Type The possible types of a patch.
 

Exception Summary
AssertionFailedException Thrown when an assertion failed.
FatalException  
SQLExecutionException This SQLException combines an SQLException together with the command that caused the exception.
SystemException Use this RuntimeException to wrap a checked exception that you can't handle and don't want to declare.
UnterminatedStatementException
